mapper.select: select a.id, a.visit_id, d.mib_id, ifnull((select settle_no from insure_setl_info where insure_setl_info.insure_settle_id = a.insureSettleId and insure_setl_info.visit_id = a.visit_id limit 1), 0) as settleNo, iib.baa027, iib.aac001, iib.bka035_name, iib.aae140, (select count(*) from sys_parameter sp, base_item bi, inpt_cost ic where sp.value = bi.code and sp.code = 'SPGA_NURS_CARE' and bi.id = ic.item_id and ic.visit_id = a.visit_id and a.hosp_code = ic.hosp_code) as spgaNurscareDays, (select count(*) from sys_parameter sp, base_item bi, inpt_cost ic where sp.value = bi.code and sp.code = 'lV1_NURS_CARE' and bi.id = ic.item_id and ic.visit_id = a.visit_id and a.hosp_code = ic.hosp_code) as lv1NurscareDays, (select count(*) from sys_parameter sp, base_item bi, inpt_cost ic where sp.value = bi.code and sp.code = 'SCD_NURS_CARE' and bi.id = ic.item_id and ic.visit_id = a.visit_id and a.hosp_code = ic.hosp_code) as scdNurscareDays, (select count(*) from sys_parameter sp, base_item bi, inpt_cost ic where sp.value = bi.code and sp.code = 'lV3_NURSE_CARE' and bi.id = ic.item_id and ic.visit_id = a.visit_id and a.hosp_code = ic.hosp_code) as lv3NursecareDays, (select su.prac_certi_no from sys_user su where su.hosp_code = b.hosp_code and b.zz_doctor_id = su.id) as doctorPracCertiNo, (select su.prac_certi_no from sys_user su where su.hosp_code = b.hosp_code and b.resp_nurse_id = su.id) as nursePracCertiNo, (select bd.code from base_dept bd where bd.id = b.in_dept_id and bd.hosp_code = b.hosp_code) as inDeptCode, (select bd.code from base_dept bd where bd.id = b.out_dept_id and bd.hosp_code = b.hosp_code) as outDeptCode, d.medical_reg_no, a.insure_settle_id, a.insureSettleId, a.hosp_code, b.in_profile, b.name, b.age, b.gender_code, b.birthday, b.nationality_cation, b.nation_code, b.cert_code, b.cert_no as certno, b.in_mode_code, b.insure_code, a.aka130, b.patient_code, b.resp_nurse_name, b.zz_doctor_name, b.in_dept_id, b.in_dept_name, b.out_dept_id, b.phone, b.address, b.out_dept_name, a.insureSettleId, a.personal_price, a.person_price, a.settleway, a.insure_org_code, a.crte_time, d.insuplc_admdvs AS insuplc, b.in_time, b.out_time, f.hi_setl_lv, f.crte_time as dclaTime, b.address, e.baby_age_month, e.work_post_code, e.turn_dept_ids, e.in_days, b.outpt_disease_name, d.visit_icd_code, e.in_situation_name, d.accessory_diagnosis_name, e.inpt_before_day, e.inpt_before_hour, e.inpt_before_minute, e.inpt_last_day, e.inpt_last_hour, e.inpt_last_minute, e.is_inpt, e.zg_doctor_name, e.zg_doctor_id, e.zr_nurse_id, e.zr_nurse_name, g.start_time, g.end_time, a.omsgid, e.out_mode_name, e.out_mode_code, e.occupation_code, e.work_address, e.work_post_code, e.work_phone, e.work, e.contact_name, e.contact_phone, e.contact_rela_code, e.contact_address, e.baby_birth_weight, e.baby_in_weight, e.turn_org_name, iib.bka035, h.invoice_id AS invoiceDetailId, e.in_way, e.occupation_code, h.invoice_no, iib.aae140, d.aka130 as iptMedType from insure_individual_settle a left join inpt_visit b on a.visit_id = b.id and a.hosp_code = b.hosp_code left join insure_individual_visit d on a.visit_id = d.visit_id and a.hosp_code = d.hosp_code left join mris_base_info e on a.visit_id = e.visit_id and a.hosp_code = e.hosp_code left join insure_individual_basic iib on iib.id = d.mib_id and iib.hosp_code = d.hosp_code left join insure_setl_info f on a.visit_id = f.visit_id and a.hosp_code = f.hosp_code left join inpt_settle g on a.visit_id = g.visit_id and a.hosp_code = g.hosp_code left join inpt_settle_invoice h on a.visit_id = h.visit_id and a.hosp_code = h.hosp_code and a.insure_settle_id = h.insure_settle_id where a.insureSettleId = #{insureSettleId} and a.state = '0' AND A.settle_state = '1' AND G.status_code = '0' AND A.insure_settle_id = #{settleId} order by a.visit_id

select ifnull((select settle_no from insure_setl_info where insure_setl_info.insure_settle_id = a.insureSettleId and insure_setl_info.visit_id = a.visit_id limit 1), 0) as settleNo, (select baa027 from insure_individual_basic iib where d.mib_id = iib.id) as baa027, (select iib.aac001 from insure_individual_basic iib where d.mib_id = iib.id) as aac001, (select iib.bka035_name from insure_individual_basic iib where d.mib_id = iib.id) as bka035_name, (select iib.aae140 from insure_individual_basic iib where d.mib_id = iib.id) as hiType, a.id, a.visit_id, a.insure_settle_id, d.medical_reg_no, a.insureSettleId, a.hosp_code, d.mib_id, ifnull((select settle_no from insure_setl_info where insure_setl_info.insure_settle_id = a.insure_settle_id and insure_setl_info.visit_id = a.visit_id limit 1), 0) as settleNo, (select baa027 from insure_individual_basic iib where d.mib_id = iib.id) as baa027, b.out_profile as inProfile, b.name, b.age, d.visit_drpt_id, (select nation_code from base_dept bd where bd.id = d.visit_drpt_id and bd.hosp_code = d.hosp_code) as inDeptCode, (select nation_code from base_dept bd where bd.id = d.visit_drpt_id and bd.hosp_code = d.hosp_code) as outDeptCode, b.gender_code, b.birthday, d.visit_drpt_id, b.nation_code, b.cert_code, b.cert_no as certno, b.insure_code, b.patient_code, '2' as aka130, a.insureSettleId, a.crte_time, a.personal_price, a.person_price, a.settleway, a.insure_org_code, a.crte_time, d.insuplc_admdvs AS insuplc, d.visit_time, d.visit_drpt_name, e.invoice_id as invoiceDetailId, e.invoice_no as invoiceNo, os.settle_time as startTime, os.settle_time as endTime, a.omsgid, f.crte_time as dclaTime, f.hi_setl_lv, g.baby_age_month, g.work, g.work_phone, g.work_address, g.work_post_code, g.baby_birth_weight, g.baby_in_weight, g.in_way, g.turn_dept_ids, g.in_days, g.in_situation_name, g.inpt_before_day, g.inpt_before_hour, g.inpt_before_minute, g.inpt_last_day, g.inpt_last_hour, g.inpt_last_minute, g.out_mode_name, g.is_inpt, g.zg_doctor_name, g.zg_doctor_id, g.zr_nurse_id, g.zr_nurse_name from insure_individual_settle a left join outpt_settle os on os.id = a.insure_settle_id and a.hosp_code = os.hosp_code left join outin_invoice_detail e on e.insure_settle_id = a.insure_settle_id and a.hosp_code = e.hosp_code left join outpt_visit b on a.visit_id = b.id left join insure_individual_visit d on a.visit_id = d.visit_id left join insure_setl_info f on a.visit_id = f.visit_id and a.hosp_code = f.hosp_code left join mris_base_info g on a.visit_id = g.visit_id and a.hosp_code = g.hosp_code where a.insureSettleId = #{insureSettleId} and a.state = '0' AND A.settle_state = '1' AND A.insure_settle_id = #{settleId} and a.hosp_code = #{hospCode} order by a.visit_id

select a.disease_id, a.type_code, a.is_main, b.name, b.code, c.oper_disease_icd9, c.oper_disease_name, c.oper_plan_time, c.doctor_id, c.doctor_name, c.rank from (inpt_diagnose a, base_disease b) left join oper_info_record c on a.visit_id = c.visit_id and c.hosp_code = a.hosp_code where a.visit_id = #{visitId} and a.disease_id = b.id and a.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and b.hosp_code = #{hospCode}

select ifnull(primary_price, 0) as primaryPrice, item_type, ifnull(apply_last_price, 0) as applyLastPrice, ifnull(fulamt_ownpay_amt, 0) as fulamtOwnpayAmt from insure_individual_cost where visit_id = #{visitId} and insure_settle_id = #{insureSettleId}

select oper_disease_icd9, oper_disease_name, oper_plan_time, doctor_id, doctor_name, assistant_id1, assistant_name1, assistant_id2, assistant_name2, assistant_id3, assistant_name3, ana_id1, ana_name1, ana_id2, ana_name2, ana_id3, ana_name3, ana_code, rank from oper_info_record where visit_id = #{visitId} and hosp_code = #{hospCode}-- 手术类型
select * from insure_icuinfo

select id, '0' as medType, item_id, item_name, crte_time, item_code, price, num, total_num, total_price, doctor_id, doctor_name, dept_id, (select name from base_dept a where a.id = dept_id) as deptName from inpt_cost where visit_id = #{id} and id not in (select a.cost_id from insure_upload_cost a where a.visit_id = #{id})

select id, '1' as medType, item_id, item_name, crte_time, item_code, price, num, total_num, total_price, doctor_id, doctor_name, dept_id, (select name from base_dept a where a.id = dept_id) as deptName from insure_individual_cost where visit_id = #{id} and id not in (select a.cost_id from insure_upload_cost a where a.visit_id = #{id})

select id, '2' as medType, item_id, item_name, crte_time, item_code, price, num, total_num, total_price, doctor_id, doctor_name, dept_id, (select name from base_dept a where a.id = dept_id) as deptName from insure_individual_cost where visit_id = #{id} and id not in (select a.cost_id from insure_upload_cost a where a.visit_id = #{id})

insert.foreach: insert into insure_upload_cost(id, hosp_code, visit_id, mdtrt_sn, ipt_otp_no, med_type, chrg_bchno, feedetl_sn, psn_cert_type, certno, psn_name, fee_ocur_time, cnt, pric, det_item_fee_sumamt, med_list_codg, medins_list_codg, medins_list_name, med_chrgitm_type, prodname, bilg_dept_codg, bilg_dept_name, bilg_dr_codg, bilg_dr_name, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time, org_code, cost_id) values (#{entity.id}, #{entity.hospCode}, #{entity.visitId}, #{entity.mdtrtSn}, #{entity.iptOtpNo}, #{entity.medType}, #{entity.chrgBchno}, #{entity.feedetlSn}, #{entity.psnCertType}, #{entity.certno}, #{entity.psnName}, #{entity.feeOcurTime}, #{entity.cnt}, #{entity.pric}, #{entity.detItemFeeSumamt}, #{entity.medListCodg}, #{entity.medinsListCodg}, #{entity.medinsListName}, #{entity.medChrgitmType}, #{entity.prodname}, #{entity.bilgDeptCodg}, #{entity.bilgDeptName}, #{entity.bilgDrCodg}, #{entity.bilgDrName}, #{entity.crteId}, #{entity.crteName}, #{entity.crteTime}, #{entity.orgCode}, #{entity.costId})

mapper.select: select id, hosp_code, visit_id, mdtrt_sn, ipt_otp_no, med_type, chrg_bchno, feedetl_sn, psn_cert_type, certno, psn_name, fee_ocur_time, cnt, pric, det_item_fee_sumamt, med_list_codg, medins_list_codg, medins_list_name, med_chrgitm_type, prodname, bilg_dept_codg, bilg_dept_name, bilg_dr_codg, bilg_dr_name, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time from insure_upload_cost where visit_id = #{id} and hosp_code = #{hospCode}

select IFNULL(total_price, 0) as totalPrice, ifnull(insure_price, 0) as insurePrice, ifnull(plan_price, 0) as planPrice, ifnull(serious_price, 0) as serivicePrice, ifnull(civil_price, 0) as civilPrice, ifnull(retire_price, 0) as retirerPrice, ifnull(personal_price, 0) as personalPrice, ifnull(person_price, 0) as personPrice from insure_individual_settle where insureSettleId = #{insureSettleId}

select item_name, ifnull(primary_price, 0) as primaryPrice, ifnull(apply_last_price, 0) as applyLastPrice, ifnull(overlmtSelfpayAmt, 0) as overlmtSelfpayAmt from insure_individual_cost where visit_id = #{visitId} and insure_settle_id = #{insureSettleId}
mapper.insert: insert into insure_setl_info(id, hosp_code, visit_id, insure_settle_id, fixmedins_name, fixmedins_code, hi_setl_lv, hi_no, medcasno, dcla_time, psn_name, gend, brdy, age, ntly, neb_age, naty, patn_cert_type, certno, prfs, curr_addr, emp_name, emp_addr, emp_tel, poscode, coner_name, patn_rlts, coner_addr, coner_tel, hi_type, insuplc, sp_psn_type, nwb_adm_type, nwb_bir_wt, nwb_adm_wt, opsp_diag_caty, opsp_mdtrt_date, ipt_med_type, adm_way, trt_type, adm_time, adm_caty, refldept_dept, dscg_time, dscg_caty, act_ipt_days, opt_wm_dise, wm_disw_code, opt_tcm_dise, tcm_dise_code, diag_code_cnt, oprn_oprt_code_cnt, vent_used_durg, pwcry_bfadmcoma_dura, pwcry_afadmcoma_dura, bld_cat, bld_amt, bld_unt, spga_nurscare_days, lv1_nurscare_days, scd_nurscare_days, lv3_nursecare_days, dscg_way, acp_medins_name, acp_optins_code, bill_code, bill_no, biz_sn, days_rinp_flag_31, days_rinp_pup_31, chfpdr_name, chfpdr_code, setl_begn_date, setl_en_date, psn_selfpay, psn_ownpay, acct_pay, psn_cashpay, hi_paymtd, hsorg, hsorg_opter, medins_fill_dept, medins_fill_psn, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time, upload_setl_id) values (#{id}, #{hospCode}, #{visitId}, #{setl_id}, #{fixmedins_name}, #{fixmedins_code}, #{hi_setl_lv}, #{hi_no}, #{medcasno}, #{dcla_time}, #{psn_name}, #{gend}, #{brdy}, #{age}, #{ntly}, #{nebAge}, #{naty}, #{patn_cert_type}, #{certno}, #{prfs}, #{curr_addr}, #{emp_name}, #{emp_addr}, #{emp_tel}, #{poscode}, #{coner_name}, #{patn_rlts}, #{coner_addr}, #{coner_tel}, #{hi_type}, #{insuplc}, #{spPsnType}, #{nwbAdmType}, #{nwb_bir_wt}, #{nwb_adm_w}, #{opsp_diag_caty}, #{opsp_mdtrt_date}, #{ipt_med_type}, #{adm_way}, #{trtType}, #{adm_time}, #{adm_caty}, #{refldept_dept}, #{dscg_time}, #{dscg_caty}, #{act_ipt_days}, #{otp_wm_dise}, #{wm_dise_code}, #{optTcmDise}, #{tcmDiseCode}, #{diagCodeCnt}, #{oprnOprtCodeCnt}, #{ventUsedDurg}, #{pwcry_bfadm_coma_dura}, #{pwcry_afadm_coma_dura}, #{bldCat}, #{bldAmt}, #{bldUnt}, #{spgaNurscare_Days}, #{lv1Nurscare_Days}, #{scdNurscare_Days}, #{lv3Nursecare_Days}, #{dscg_way}, #{acpMedinsName}, #{acpOptinsCode}, #{bill_code}, #{bill_no}, #{biz_sn}, #{days_rinp_flag_31}, #{daysRinpPup31}, #{chfpdr_name}, #{chfpdr_code}, #{setl_begn_date}, #{setl_end_date}, #{psn_selfpay}, #{psn_ownpay}, #{acct_pay}, #{psn_cashpay}, #{hi_paymtd}, #{hsorg}, #{hsorg_opter}, #{medins_fill_dept}, #{medins_fill_psn}, #{crteId}, #{crteName}, #{crteTime}, #{uploadSetlListId})

insert into insure_oprninfo(id, hosp_code, visit_id, medical_reg_no, insure_settle_id, oprn_oprt_type, oprn_oprt_name, oprn_oprt_code, oprn_oprt_date, anst_way, oper_dr_name, oper_dr_code, anst_dr_name, anst_dr_code) values
(#{item.id},#{item.hospCode},#{item.visitId},#{item.medicalRegNo},#{item.insureSettleId}, #{item.oprnOprtType},#{item.oprnOprtName},#{item.oprnOprtCode}, #{item.oprnOprtDate},#{item.anstWay},#{item.operDrName},#{item.operDrCode}, #{item.anstDrName},{item.anstDrCode})

insert into insure_icuinfo(id, hosp_code, visit_id, medical_reg_no,insure_settle_id, scs_cutd_ward_type, scs_cutd_inpool_time, scs_cutd_exit_time, scs_cutd_sum_dura) values
(#{item.id},#{item.hospCode},#{item.visitId},#{item.medicalRegNo},#{item.insureSettleId}, #{item.scsCutdWardType},#{item.scsCutdInpoolTime},#{item.scsCutdExitTime}, #{item.scsCutdSumDura})

insert into insure_iteminfo (id, hosp_code, visit_id, medical_reg_no, insure_settle_id, med_chrgitm, amt,claa_sumfee, clab_amt, fulamt_ownpay_amt, oth_amt) values
(#{item.id},#{item.hospCode},#{item.visitId},#{item.medicalRegNo},#{item.insureSettleId}, #{item.medChrgitm},#{item.amt},#{item.claaSumfee}, #{item.clabAmt}, #{item.fulamtOwnpayAmt}, #{item.othAmt})

insert into insure_payinfo (id, hosp_code, visit_id, medical_reg_no, insure_settle_id, fund_pay_type, fund_payamt) values
(#{item.id},#{item.hospCode},#{item.visitId},#{item.medicalRegNo},#{item.insureSettleId}, #{item.fund_pay_type},#{item.fund_payamt})

insert into insure_opspdiseinfo(id, hosp_code, visit_id, medical_reg_no, insure_settle_id, diag_code, diag_name, oprn_oprt_name, oprn_oprt_code) VALUES
(#{item.id},#{item.hospCode},#{item.visitId},#{item.medicalRegNo},#{item.insureSettleId}, #{item.diagCode},#{item.diagName},#{item.oprnOprtName},#{item.oprnOprtCode})

insert into insure_setl_info(id, hosp_code, visit_id, insure_settle_id, settle_no, fixmedins_name, fixmedins_code, hi_setl_lv, hi_no, medcasno, dcla_time, psn_name, gend, brdy, age, ntly, neb_age, naty, patn_cert_type, certno, prfs, curr_addr, emp_name, emp_addr, emp_tel, poscode, coner_name, patn_rlts, coner_addr, coner_tel, hi_type, insuplc, sp_psn_type, nwb_adm_type, nwb_bir_wt, nwb_adm_wt, opsp_diag_caty, opsp_mdtrt_date, ipt_med_type, adm_way, trt_type, adm_time, adm_caty, refldept_dept, dscg_time, dscg_caty, act_ipt_days, opt_wm_dise, wm_disw_code, opt_tcm_dise, tcm_dise_code, diag_code_cnt, oprn_oprt_code_cnt, vent_used_durg, pwcry_bfadmcoma_dura, pwcry_afadmcoma_dura, bld_cat, bld_amt, bld_unt, spga_nurscare_days, lv1_nurscare_days, scd_nurscare_days, lv3_nursecare_days, dscg_way, acp_medins_name, acp_optins_code, bill_code, bill_no, biz_sn, days_rinp_flag_31, days_rinp_pup_31, chfpdr_name, chfpdr_code, setl_begn_date, setl_en_date, psn_selfpay, psn_ownpay, acct_pay, psn_cashpay, hi_paymtd, hsorg, hsorg_opter, medins_fill_dept, medins_fill_psn, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time, zr_nurseName, zr_nurseCode, mdtrt_id, opt_tcm_dise_code, opt_wm_dise_code) values (#{id}, #{hospCode}, #{visitId}, #{insureSettleId}, #{settleNo}, #{fixmedinsName}, #{fixmedinsCode}, #{hiSetlLv}, #{hiNo}, #{medcasno}, #{dclaTime}, #{psnName}, #{gend}, #{brdy}, #{age}, #{ntly}, #{nebAge}, #{naty}, #{patnCertType}, #{certno}, #{prfs}, #{currAddr}, #{empName}, #{empAddr}, #{empTel}, #{poscode}, #{conerName}, #{patnRlts}, #{conerAddr}, #{conerTel}, #{hiType}, #{insuplc}, #{spPsnType}, #{nwbAdmType}, #{nwbBirWt}, #{nwbAdmWt}, #{opspDiagCaty}, #{opspMdtrtDate}, #{iptMedType}, #{admWay}, #{trtType}, #{admTime}, #{admCaty}, #{refldeptDept}, #{dscgTime}, #{dscgCaty}, #{actIptDays}, #{otpWmDise}, #{wmDiseCode}, #{otpTcmDise}, #{tcmDiseCode}, #{diagCodeCnt}, #{oprnOprtCodeCnt}, #{ventUsedDurg}, #{pwcryBfadmComaDura}, #{pwcryAfadmComaDura}, #{bldCat}, #{bldAmt}, #{bldUnt}, #{spgaNurscareDays}, #{lv1NurscareDays}, #{scdNurscareDays}, #{lv3NursecareDays}, #{dscgWay}, #{acpMedinsName}, #{acpOptinsCode}, #{billCode}, #{billNo}, #{bizSn}, #{daysRinpFlag31}, #{daysRinpPup31}, #{chfpdrName}, #{chfpdrCode}, #{setlBegnDate}, #{setlEndDate}, #{psnSelfpay}, #{psnOwnpay}, #{acctPay}, #{psnCashpay}, #{hiPaymtd}, #{hsorg}, #{hsorgOpter}, #{medinsFillDept}, #{medinsFillPsn}, #{crteId}, #{crteName}, #{crteTime}, #{zrNurseName}, #{zrNurseCode}, #{mdtrtId}, #{otpTcmDiseCode}, #{otpWmDiseCode})

insert into insure_diseinfo(id, hosp_code, visit_id, medical_reg_no, insure_settle_id, diag_type, diag_code, diag_name, maindiag_flag, adm_cond_type) values
(#{item.id},#{item.hospCode},#{item.visitId},#{item.medicalRegNo},#{item.insureSettleId}, #{item.typeCode}, #{item.diseaseCode},#{item.diseaseName},#{item.isMain},#{item.admCondType})
mapper.select: select id, hosp_code, visit_id, cost_id, insure_settle_id, is_hospital, item_type, item_code, item_name, guest_ratio as selfpay_prop, primary_price, apply_last_price, order_no, transmit_code, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time, rxSn, overlmtSelfpayAmt, chrgItemLv as chrgitm_lv, fulamtOwnpayFlag, ownpayRea, hiLmtpric, fulamt_ownpay_amt, overlmt_selfpay, preselfpay_amt, inscp_scp_amt, medChrgitmType as med_chrgitm_type, overlmt_amt, lmt_used_flag, pric_uplmt_amt, insure_settle_id, insure_is_transmit, batch_no, sum_fee, det_item_fee_sumamt from insure_individual_cost where visit_id = #{visitId} and hosp_code = #{hospCode} and insure_settle_id = #{insureSettleId}

SELECT iv.name, b.id, b.item_name, b.total_num, b.spec, b.price, b.crte_time, b.doctor_name, (case b.item_code when b.item_code = '1' then (select bd.code from base_drug bd where b.item_id = bd.id and bd.hosp_code = b.hosp_code) when b.item_code = '2' then (select bm.code from base_material bm where b.item_id = bm.id and bm.hosp_code = b.hosp_code) when b.item_code = '4' then (select ba.code from base_advice ba where b.item_id = ba.id and ba.hosp_code = b.hosp_code) else (select bi.code from base_item bi where b.item_id = bi.id and bi.hosp_code = b.hosp_code) end ) as hospItemCode, iim.hosp_item_id, b.total_price totalPrice, b.reality_price realityPrice FROM inpt_cost b LEFT JOIN insure_item_match iim ON b.item_id = iim.hosp_item_id join inpt_visit iv on (iv.id = b.visit_id and iv.hosp_code = b.hosp_code) WHERE b.visit_id = #{id} AND ( iim.is_trans = '0' OR b.item_id <> ifnull(iim.hosp_item_id, ''))

SELECT iv.name, b.id, b.item_name, b.total_num, b.spec, b.price, b.crte_time, b.doctor_name, (case b.item_code when b.item_code = '1' then (select bd.code from base_drug bd where b.item_id = bd.id and bd.hosp_code = b.hosp_code) when b.item_code = '2' then (select bm.code from base_material bm where b.item_id = bm.id and bm.hosp_code = b.hosp_code) when b.item_code = '4' then (select ba.code from base_advice ba where b.item_id = ba.id and ba.hosp_code = b.hosp_code) else (select bi.code from base_item bi where b.item_id = bi.id and bi.hosp_code = b.hosp_code) end ) as hospItemCode, iim.hosp_item_id, b.total_price totalPrice, b.reality_price realityPrice FROM outpt_cost b LEFT JOIN insure_item_match iim ON b.item_id = iim.hosp_item_id join outpt_visit iv on (iv.id = b.visit_id and iv.hosp_code = b.hosp_code) WHERE b.visit_id = #{id} AND ( iim.is_trans = '0' OR b.item_id <> ifnull(iim.hosp_item_id, ''))

select id, visit_id, insure_settle_id, settle_no, IF(settle_no = settle_no is NULL OR settle_no = '', '未上传', '已上传') as isUpload, fixmedins_name, fixmedins_code, hi_setl_lv, hi_no, medcasno, dcla_time, psn_name, gend, brdy, age, ntly, neb_age, naty, patn_cert_type, certno, prfs, curr_addr, emp_name, emp_addr, emp_tel, poscode, coner_name, patn_rlts, coner_addr, coner_tel, hi_type, insuplc, sp_psn_type, nwb_adm_type, nwb_bir_wt, nwb_adm_wt, opsp_diag_caty, opsp_mdtrt_date, ipt_med_type, adm_way, trt_type, adm_time, adm_caty, refldept_dept, dscg_time, dscg_caty, act_ipt_days, opt_wm_dise, wm_disw_code, opt_tcm_dise, tcm_dise_code, diag_code_cnt, oprn_oprt_code_cnt, vent_used_durg, pwcry_bfadmcoma_dura, pwcry_afadmcoma_dura, bld_cat, bld_amt, bld_unt, spga_nurscare_days, lv1_nurscare_days, scd_nurscare_days, lv3_nursecare_days, dscg_way, acp_medins_name, acp_optins_code, bill_code, bill_no, biz_sn, days_rinp_flag_31, days_rinp_pup_31, chfpdr_name, chfpdr_code, setl_begn_date, setl_en_date, psn_selfpay, psn_ownpay, acct_pay, psn_cashpay, hi_paymtd, hsorg, hsorg_opter, medins_fill_dept, medins_fill_psn, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time, hosp_code from insure_setl_info where insure_settle_id = #{insureSettleId} and visit_id = #{visitId} and hosp_code = #{hospCode}

select id, hosp_code, receive_id, receive_name, receive_time, use_id, use_name, type_code, prefix, start_no, end_no, curr_no, status_code, num, remark, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time from outin_invoice where hosp_code = #{hospCode} and id = #{id}

select '' as oprn_oprt_type, oper_disease_name, oper_disease_icd9, oper_time as oper_end_time, ana_code as anst_way, (select prac_certi_no from sys_user su where su.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and oper_doctor_id = su.id) as oper_dr_code, oper_doctor_name, (select prac_certi_no from sys_user su where su.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and ana_id1 = su.id) as anst_dr_code, ana_name1 as anst_dr_name from mris_oper_info where visit_id = #{visitId} and hosp_code = #{hospCode}

select '' as oprn_oprt_type, oir.oper_disease_name, oir.oper_disease_icd9, oir.oper_end_time, oir.ana_code as anst_way, (select prac_certi_no from sys_user su where su.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and oir.doctor_id = su.id) as oper_dr_code, doctor_name as oper_dr_name, (select prac_certi_no from sys_user su where su.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and oir.ana_id1 = su.id) as anst_dr_code, ana_name1 as anst_dr_name from oper_info_record oir where oir.visit_id = #{visitId} and oir.hosp_code = #{hospCode}

select id, hosp_code, visit_id, medical_reg_no, scs_cutd_ward_type, scs_cutd_inpool_time, scs_cutd_exit_time, scs_cutd_sum_dura from insure_icuinfo where hosp_code = #{hospCode} and visit_id = #{visitId}

select id, hosp_code, in_profile as profileNo, in_no, name, gender_code, age, age_unit_code, birthday, nationality_cation as ntly, occupation_code, education_code, contact_name, contact_rela_code, contact_address, contact_phone, nation_code, cert_code, cert_no, marry_code, phone, address, preferential_type_id, patient_code, receive_hosp_name, bed_id, bed_name, nursing_code, diet_type, Illness_code, status_code, in_ward_id, in_dept_id, (select bd.nation_code from base_dept bd where bd.id = a.in_dept_id and bd.hosp_code = a.hosp_code) inDeptNatinCode, (select bd.nation_code from base_dept bd where bd.id = a.out_dept_id and bd.hosp_code = a.hosp_code) outDeptNatinCode, (select su.prac_certi_no from sys_user su where su.id = a.resp_nurse_id and su.hosp_code = a.hosp_code) nursePracCertiNo, (select su.prac_certi_no from sys_user su where su.id = a.zz_doctor_id and su.hosp_code = a.hosp_code) doctorPracCertiNo, (select count(item_id) from inpt_cost ic where ic.visit_id = a.id and ic.hosp_code = a.hosp_code and ic.status_code = '0' and ic.item_name in ('一级护理', 'Ⅰ级护理', '1级护理')) as lv1NurscareDays, (select count(item_id) from inpt_cost ic where ic.visit_id = a.id and ic.hosp_code = a.hosp_code and ic.status_code = '0' and ic.item_name in ('二级护理', 'Ⅱ级护理', '2级护理')) as scdNurscareDays, (select count(item_id) from inpt_cost ic where ic.visit_id = a.id and ic.hosp_code = a.hosp_code and ic.status_code = '0' and ic.item_name in ('三级护理', 'Ⅲ级护理', '3级护理')) as lv3NursecareDays, (select ceil(count(item_id) / 24) from inpt_cost ic where ic.visit_id = a.id and ic.hosp_code = a.hosp_code and ic.status_code = '0' and ic.item_name in ('特级护理')) as spgaNurscareDays, in_dept_name, in_time, zz_doctor_id, zz_doctor_name, jz_doctor_name, zg_doctor_name, in_remark, in_mode_code as adm_way, in_disease_id, in_disease_name, in_disease_icd10, in_situation_code, outpt_visit_no, outpt_doctor_id, outpt_doctor_name, outpt_disease_id, outpt_disease_name, outpt_disease_icd10, out_ward_id, out_dept_id, out_dept_name, out_time, out_disease_id, out_disease_name, out_disease_icd10, out_oper_id, out_oper_name, out_oper_time, out_situation_code, out_remark, out_mode_code, total_advance, total_cost, total_balance, guarantee_balance, resp_nurse_id, resp_nurse_name, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time as inTime, total_in_days, (select min(ic.cost_time) from inpt_cost ic where ic.hosp_code = a.hosp_code and ic.visit_id = a.id and ic.status_code = '0' and ic.settle_id =#{settleId}) as setlBegnDate, (select max(ic.cost_time) from inpt_cost ic where ic.hosp_code = a.hosp_code and ic.visit_id = a.id and ic.status_code = '0' and ic.settle_id =#{settleId}) as setlEndDate, (select m.crte_name from inpt_settle m where m.visit_id = a.id and m.hosp_code = a.hosp_code and m.status_code = '0' and m.is_settle = '1' and m.id =#{settleId}) as feeCrteTime from inpt_visit a where a.id = #{visitId} and a.hosp_code = #{hospCode}

select id, hosp_code, profile_id, out_profile as profileNo, '' as ntly, register_id, register_no, name, gender_code, age, age_unit_code, birthday, marry_code, nation_code, cert_code, cert_no, phone, now_address, visit_no, visit_code, patient_code, preferential_type_id, source_tj_code as adm_way, source_tj_remark, insure_code, insure_org_code, doctor_id, doctor_name, dept_id, (select bd.nation_code from base_dept bd where bd.id = dept_id and bd.hosp_code = hosp_code) inDeptNatinCode, dept_name, visit_time, remark, pym, wbm, is_visit, is_first_visit, tran_in_code, in_cert_time, in_dept_id, in_disease_id, in_remark, advance_payment, crte_time , (select m.crte_time from outpt_settle m where m.visit_id = ov.id and m.hosp_code = ov.hosp_code and m.status_code = '0' and m.is_settle = '1' and id =#{settleId}) as crteTime, (select min(ic.crte_time) from outpt_cost ic where ic.hosp_code = ov.hosp_code and ic.visit_id = ov.id and ic.status_code = '0' and ic.settle_id =#{settleId}) as setlBegnDate, (select max(ic.crte_time) from outpt_cost ic where ic.hosp_code = ov.hosp_code and ic.visit_id = ov.id and ic.status_code = '0' and ic.settle_id =#{settleId}) as setlEndDate, (select m.crte_name from outpt_settle m where m.visit_id = ov.id and m.hosp_code = ov.hosp_code and m.status_code = '0' and m.is_settle = '1' and m.id =#{settleId}) as feeCrteTime from outpt_visit ov where ov.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and ov.id = #{visitId}

select id, hosp_code, visit_id, medical_reg_no, insure_settle_id, fund_pay_type, fund_payamt from insure_payinfo where visit_id = #{visitId} and hosp_code = #{hospCode} and insure_settle_id = #{insureSettleId}

select id, hosp_code, visit_id, medical_reg_no, insure_settle_id, med_chrgitm medChrgitm, claa_sumfee claaSumfee, amt, clab_amt clabAmt, fulamt_ownpay_amt fulamtOwnpayAmt, oth_amt othAmt from insure_iteminfo where visit_id = #{visitId} and hosp_code = #{hospCode} and insure_settle_id = #{insureSettleId}

select id, hosp_code, visit_id, medical_reg_no, insure_settle_id, oprn_oprt_type, oprn_oprt_name, oprn_oprt_code, oprn_oprt_date, anst_way, oper_dr_name, oper_dr_code, anst_dr_name, anst_dr_code from insure_oprninfo where visit_id = #{visitId} and hosp_code = #{hospCode} and insure_settle_id = #{insureSettleId}

select id, hosp_code, visit_id, medical_reg_no, insure_settle_id, diag_code, diag_name, oprn_oprt_name, oprn_oprt_code from insure_opspdiseinfo where visit_id = #{visitId} and hosp_code = #{hospCode} and insure_settle_id = #{insureSettleId}

select id, hosp_code, visit_id, medical_reg_no, insure_settle_id, diag_type, diag_code, diag_name, maindiag_flag, adm_cond_type from insure_diseinfo where visit_id = #{visitId} and hosp_code = #{hospCode} and insure_settle_id = #{insureSettleId}

select mbi.*, (select bd.nation_code from base_dept bd where bd.hosp_code = mbi.hosp_code and bd.id = mbi.turn_dept_ids) as nation_code from mris_base_info mbi where mbi.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and mbi.visit_id = #{visitId}

select id, hosp_code as hospCode, visit_id as visitId, medical_reg_no medicalRegNo, scs_cutd_ward_type scsCutdWardType, scs_cutd_inpool_time scsCutdInpoolTime, scs_cutd_exit_time scsCutdExitTime, scs_cutd_sum_dura scsCutdSumDura, insure_settle_id insureSettleId from insure_icuinfo where visit_id = #{visitId} and hosp_code = #{hospCode} and insure_settle_id = #{insureSettleId}

select id, hosp_code hospCode, visit_id visitId, medical_reg_no medicalRegNo, insure_settle_id insureSetllId, oprn_oprt_type OprnOprtType, oprn_oprt_name oprnOprtName, oprn_oprt_code oprnOprtCode, oprn_oprt_code oprnOprtCode, anst_way anstWay, oper_dr_name operDrName, oper_dr_code operDrCode, anst_dr_name anstDrName, anst_dr_code anstDrCode from insure_oprninfo where visit_id = #{visitId} and hosp_code = #{hospCode} and insure_settle_id = #{insureSettleId}

select id, hosp_code hospCode, visit_id visitId, medical_reg_no medicalRegNo, insure_settle_id insureSettleId, diag_type type_code, diag_code diseaseCode, diag_name diseaseName, maindiag_flag is_main, adm_cond_type admCondType from insure_diseinfo WHERE insure_settle_id = #{insureSettleId} and visit_id = #{visitId} and hosp_code = #{hospCode}

select id, hosp_code hospCode, visit_id visitId, medical_reg_no medicalRegNo, insure_settle_id insureSettleId, diag_code diagCode, diag_name diagName, oprn_oprt_name oprnOprtName, oprn_oprt_code oprnOprtCode from insure_opspdiseinfo WHERE insure_settle_id = #{insureSettleId} and visit_id = #{visitId} and hosp_code = #{hospCode}

select id, hosp_code hospCode, visit_id visitId, medical_reg_no medicalRegNo, insure_settle_id insureSettleId, fund_pay_type fundPayType, fund_payamt fundPayAmt from insure_payinfo where visit_id = #{visitId} and hosp_code = #{hospCode} and insure_settle_id = #{insureSettleId}

select iis.insure_reg_code AS insureRegCode, iis.visit_id as visitId, iis.medicine_org_code as medicineOrgCode, iiv.medical_reg_no as medicalRegNo, iiv.is_hospital as isHospital, iiv.medical_reg_no AS mdtrtId, iis.insureSettleId AS setlId, iis.settle_id settleId, iis.settle_id, iis.crte_time, iib.aac003 AS psnName, iib.aac004 AS sex, iis.aka130 as med_type from insure_individual_settle iis join insure_individual_visit iiv on iis.visit_id = iiv.visit_id and iis.hosp_code = iiv.hosp_code and iis.medicalRegNo = iiv.medical_reg_no join insure_individual_basic iib on iiv.mib_id = iib.id and iiv.hosp_code = iib.hosp_code left join insure_setl_info isi on iis.insureSettleId = isi.insure_settle_id and iis.hosp_code = isi.hosp_code and iis.visit_id = iiv.visit_id where iis.state ='0' and iis.settle_state ='1' and iis.hosp_code =#{hospCode} and iis.insureSettleId is not null
and ( iib.aac003 like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or iiv.medical_reg_no like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or iis.insureSettleId like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') )
and isi.settle_no is not null
and ifnull(isi.settle_no,'0') ='0'
and date(iis.crte_time) >= date(#{startDate})
and date(iis.crte_time) <= date(#{endDate})
and iis.is_hospital =#{isHospital}
and iiv.aka130 = '14'
select bka006,bka006_name,visit_icd_code,visit_icd_name from insure_individual_visit where visit_id =#{visitId} and hosp_code =#{hospCode}
